companyInfo.Competitors: Visiting Nurse Service of New York, YAI National Institute, Fox Rehabilitation

jobDescription: Our Vision reflects our passion for making a positive difference in the life of children and adults receiving the therapy services as well as in the life of the therapist who provides them. We're seeking Speech Language Pathologist – CFY for full or Part time opportunities working with school-aged population in a school or home setting. . We welcome new grads and embrace experienced providers. At Infinite Services, we are dedicated to matching our providers with great opportunities within the 5 boroughs of NY. We offer our Speech Language Pathologist /SLP - CFY competitive rates and support, both clinically and administratively. Our Speech Supervisor gives optimal levels of supervision. We provide onsite first day mentoring and continuous field and individualized support to help you gain experience, independence and confidence as a new Speech Language Pathologist. We provide CEU seminars, Mentoring and Professional Development to all our Clinical Fellows as your professional growth is a top priority at Infinite Services.  Responsibilities will include:Provide comprehensive treatment to students according to thier goals listed in thier IEPs.Document students progress in an accurate and timely manner.Complete billing logs and bill ethically and accurately for services rendered.other duties as neededWhat You’ll Need:Masters in Speech Language Pathology,TSSLD or TSHH Certification DOE Fingerprints Why Infinite Services?We are not just a team, we are a family.Company benefits include medical/dental/vision/401K & commuter3 different divisions under one umbrella… Skilled Nursing, Home Care & Schools!We are a melting pot and have staff from all over the world.
